text: chen deiyw kab sphaph hæng wngswan firˌ xea n læa brrda phu kxn hna phwk khea sung phwk khea ptiseth brrda xongkar hæng phracea khxng phwk khea læw rea kdi thalay phwk khea neuxngdwy khwam phid khxng phwk khea læa rea di hı wngswan firˌ xea n cm natay læa thanghmd nan phwk khea pen phu xthrrm
